entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
